bgDescription: It is an opportunity for encounters, a testimony of shared experiences, a key that opens hearts, and an unforgettable collaboration.
description: A scroll painting that Zhezhi gave you. This is the first scroll painting she has painted with her Forte in many years. The beautiful scenery depicted in the painting seems to give off a different feeling than before.
obtainDescription: A scroll painting that Zhezhi gave you. The beautiful scenery depicted in the painting seems to give off a different feeling than before.
